RMI.Client

类 SDInvokeRemoteConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMI.RMIBase.SDRemoteConnection
      • RMI.Client.SDInvokeRemoteConnection

  • public class SDInvokeRemoteConnection
extends SDRemoteConnection
    SDInvokeRemoteConnection is a subclass of SDRemoteConnection. It is mainly used to send a invocation from client to server. This connection will handle invoke, marshalling, unmarshalling. It may support features like timeout, at-least one send, etc.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 RMI.RMIBase.SDRemoteConnection

        in, out, socket

    • 构造器概要

      • invoke

        public java.lang.Object invoke(SDRemoteObjectReference ref,
                      java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                      long methodHash,
                      java.lang.Object[] params)
                        throws SDConnectionException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Start point of an Invocation. Based on protocol, send method and parameters to server, and waiting return.

        ref -
        method -
        methodHash -
        params -
